nodes.text: Alex Dei-Licoli was a male Human living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum he traveled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. He was assigned to the Science and Research branch of the Alliance under Doctor Juvard Illip Oggurobb.

Alex Dei-Licoli appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion as the Imperial Agent vendor inside Odessen base. He stand as an hommage to a Lead Game Master who worked at a BioWare facility in Ireland before dying in 2015.
